title: 'People are not bargaining chips' – U.S. blasts China over sentencing of Canadian man in case linked to Huawei
content:
1. 'People are not bargaining chips' – U.S. blasts China over sentencing of Canadian man in case linked to Huawei  CNBC
  2. China sentences Canadian businessman Michael Spavor to 11 years for spying  South China Morning Post
  3. Canadian businessman Michael Spavor sentenced by Chinese court to 11 years in prison for spying  CNN
  4. LILLEY: Spavor sentenced in a fake court, Trudeau needs to hold firm  Toronto Sun
  5. Ottawa pressured to help Canadians detained in China  Global News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 人は交渉材料ではない」-ファーウェイに関連する事件のカナダ人男性の判決で米国が中国を非難
